City of Hallettsville
=====================



![Website Banner Photo](https://cityofhallettsville.org/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/Website-Banner-Photo-oj4w7xyjr5yecisctasy289qx36b3qgwo47a43k2ty.jpg "Website Banner Photo")
Facebook

**[Police Department Facebook Page](https://www.facebook.com/HallettsvillePD/)**

The Texas Workforce Commission (“TWC”) is the entity responsible for enforcing the Fair Housing Act in the State of Texas. You have one year after an alleged violation to file a complaint, but you should file it as soon as possible.  Go to
[https://www.tdhchttps://www.tdhca.texas.gov/how-file-fair-housing-complaint](https://www.tdhca.texas.gov/how-file-fair-housing-complaint)
to file a complaint.
